description: Lawmakers in the House Oversight Committee talked with officials from the State and Homeland Security Departments about efforts to properly vet visitors and asylum seekers coming to the United States.
title: House Hears Testimony on Visa Programs
title_page: House Hears Testimony on Visa Programs - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Lawmakers in the House Oversight Committee talked with officials from the State and Homeland Security Departments about efforts to properly vet visitors and asylum seekers coming to the United States.
